name: Neon Esper
description:
Neon Esper is a 2D top-down Action versus game with Neon style graphics. You play against a friend as an Esper battler trying to prove his superiority.  Your attacks stay on the map as traps that you can activate later. Use this moveset to outsmart your friend !

This is a little game made as a side project in 3 weeks, I hope you have a good time playing it !

/!\ It is recommended to play with TWO Xbox 360 controller or Xbox One Controller !  /!\

If you have only one controller you can still play with one person on keyboard.

The keyboard controls are : 

ZQSD to move, C to do a Linear Attack, V to do a Circular Attack, X to Release the Traps, and SPACE to Dash.

Game made by Aurélien Mary ! I am a game design student and you can find my personal website here !
